message.content:
Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this message finds you in good health and spirit. I would like to inform you that [Your Name] will be leaving the company effective [Date]. During their time here, [He/She] has shown immense dedication and hard work which has helped the team achieve many milestones.

[Your Name] has decided to pursue new opportunities and challenge themselves further in their professional journey. I wanted you to hear about this news directly from me, and if there's anything that needs to be taken care of before [his/her] departure, please let me know.

Please let me know if you need any additional information or have any questions. I would be more than happy to assist you in any way possible during this transition period.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
